dmca.title: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
Webmaster,
 
Consider this email as official notice to cease and desist improper and illegal internet activity immediately.
 
My online identity as SexxxySadie, plus my domain name sexxxysadie.com are copyright protected.
Also copyright protected is all the original work published on my website, http://sexxxysadie.com,. including all additional sub pages contained.
In addition, the use of my name and domain name on my various blogs, as SexxxySadie and/or reference to SexxxySadie.com is protected.
 
Many different domains which are under your direct or indirect control have been using copied content, titles, and descriptions from my webpages as titles and description to promote their own domain webpages.
 
This is theft of commerce, identity theft, spamming of my good domain name, and in violation of copyright infringement regulations.  
Plus this is in violation of ICANN regulations.
 
As example, below is copy/paste of just two items from a saved Google search results dated Nov 05, 2007.    
Query words used:   linsey dawn mckenzie sexxxysadie.
 
-------------------------------------------------------
 Gianna Michaels Nude Actions
    <http://gianna-michaels-nude-actions.leviinccom.cn/index.html>
 
*SexxxySadie*.com Adults Only Porn Nude Photos, XXX Sex Video Clips,
Porn Star biography info. Gianna Michaels. *Linsey Dawn McKenzie*. Kerry
Marie. Desirae. *...*
gianna-michaels-nude-actions.leviinccom.cn/index.html - 10k - Cached
<http://72.14.205.104/search?q=cache:RnNKVmiXQXYJ:gianna-michaels-nude-actions.leviinccom.cn/index.html+linsey+dawn+mckenzie+sexxxysadie&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=13&gl=us>
- Similar pages
</search?hl=en&q=related:gianna-michaels-nude-actions.leviinccom.cn/index.html>
- Note this <#>
-------------------------------------------------------
 Busty Dusty Free Pics
    <http://busty-dusty-free-pics.lawyermamaalso.cn/index.html>
 
*SexxxySadie* Adults Only Porn featuring Big Boobs Models Free Big Boob
Porn Pics, Pictures, Videos.. *Linsey Dawn McKenzie*, Desirae, Busty
Dusty Stash, *...*
busty-dusty-free-pics.lawyermamaalso.cn/index.html - 11k - Cached
<http://72.14.205.104/search?q=cache:-aqvfIWpuDMJ:busty-dusty-free-pics.lawyermamaalso.cn/index.html+linsey+dawn+mckenzie+sexxxysadie&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=14&gl=us>
- Similar pages
</search?hl=en&q=related:busty-dusty-free-pics.lawyermamaalso.cn/index.html>
- Note this <#>
-------------------------------------------------------
You will see that descriptions were copied from my sexxxysadie.com webpages and were then used to promote and benefit http://leviinccom.cn and http://lawyermamaalso.cn. 
Stop this practice immediately.  
 
Whether this misuse is originating from your domain caravan.ru 
or from any domain registered through your caravan.ru 
or any domain processed or serviced by you or your organization, 
immediately have removed any and all references to SexxxySadie, or SexxxySadie.com, 
plus any SexxxySadie webpages content, titles and/or page descriptions.  
 
In addition, refrain from any future use of my names and or properties.
Most domains listed below were involved in this activity as url target domains  
A few domain names listed below were involved as part of server transmission process.
Problem domains identified:
 
Domain:  caravan.ru
Domain:  abdnresearchstop.cm
Domain:  aspdomprint.cn
Domain:  corbina.net
Domain:  comkatkam.cn
Domain:  dvddvdblu-ray.cn
Domain:  forisokat.cn
Domain:  goallinecards.info
Domain:  govtoptop.cn
Domain:  lawyermamaalso.cn
Domain:  leviicncom.cn
Domain:  lastnikemissile.cn
Domain:  nytimescomhome.cn
Domain:  obl.ru
Domain:  silvergood.info
Domain:  supersupermart.info
Domain:  topgoalsports.info
This list is not necessarily complete, and will be considered to include any and all domains owned, processed, or serviced by caravan.ru.
 
I have saved many various search engine results for use as supporting documentation.  
My documentation shows query data, date, time, and with all resulting in same or similar improper use of my copyrighted domain name.   
 
Hopefully this notice to you will be the last step necessary to stop these violations.  
 
SexxxySadie
SexxxySadie.com
sadie@sexxxysadie.com
